title: Help me increase fps and remove fps drops
body:
Hello, ive been suffering about this fps lag and drop. i tried everything and search everything to fix it but none of them helps. I also download low quality map on wooxy but it didnt work. I have 55-45 fps at the beginning when the minions spawn my fps drops to 35-24 when im in my lane with opponent it drops to 20-10 and in late game my fps goes to 8 fps or less which gives me aids while playing.

these are my specs
Graphics card: AMD Radeon HD 8200 / R3 Series.
Processor: AMD E1-2500 APU with Radeon(TM) HD Graphics 1.40GHz
RAM: 4GB
System type: 64 bit

i apologize if you cant understand my english its not my first language :(

If you have any idea to fix this please share it to me and i also dont have enough money to buy a new pc :(

THANK YOU <3

replies.body: Ahhhhhh the main issue of your FPS drops could be your processor. If you check your specs against the [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1) you'll see that we recommend having at _least_ a 2.0GHz processor.
